name: Node.js with pnpm
description: Installs Node.js and pnpm package manager

nodeVersion.description: Select or enter a Node.js version to install. Use 'lts' for latest LTS, or specify exact version (e.g., '22.16.0').

pnpmVersion.description: Select or enter a pnpm version to install. Leave empty for the latest version, or specify exact version (e.g., '10.11.1').

installPackages.description: Optional space-separated list of npm packages to install globally using pnpm (e.g., 'typescript eslint prettier').
